name: FROGGIN' AROUND
description:
A little froggy in a little pond eatin' bugs, takin' naps, and just froggin' around.

FROGGIN' AROUND is a cute and casual overhead action/muncher game. Your job is to guide little froggy around the pond, hopping along lily pads and swimming through the waters, all while trying to catch delicious little flies to fill their belly! Of course, little froggy can't just eat anything: ignore the toxic ladybugs, avoid dangerous beetles, and survive the slithering snakes!

With your help, little froggy will endure!

Features:
- An adorable little pink frog that will make you go "aww, cute!"
- A variety of bugs with bafflingly believable behaviors (some less tasty than others)
- Smooth, intuitive physics and tight, responsive controls
- A nostalgic, retro inspired 16-bit aesthetic
- A goldfish (don't eat them)



Note: A gamepad is STRONGLY recommended to play this game, but is not required.
